How 'bout CapJhin Sparrow?
Can we get a phantom of the opera inspired Jhin? Jhin of the Opera, or Phantom Jhin? :)
Here is my submission :D  http://orig02.deviantart.net/7d2b/f/2016/040/4/9/i_will_make_you_beautiful__by_jaykrayzed-d9r5e1s.jpg
Really creepy... o_o I like it!

i was thinking, and I know this would take more work on riots part and im not saying that you haven't worked enough, but I just thought because of the trailer that was put out to tease him showed different works of art through the different champions death, wouldn't it makes sense to include different effects on his deaths more like the teaser? I have read the q&a answers where they said the chose one that could be universally good enough for gameplay since obviously using a different animation for each death would be impossible and use a lot of data, but I had a decent idea to counter that. I think, as shown in the video, it could be just as visually beautiful to, instead of the same flower that spawns on death, include different death animations depending on their primary roles (tank, mage, support, etc...). I think this would crate even more of a translation of his meticulously planned "art" by death to his lore/teaser. 

Anyways, just a thought that I would have pushed for in designing the champ. I know its a lot to ask for. Wishful thinking right?

Guy Fawkes Skin? V For Vendetta skin?
There's my stuff if you wanna add it :D https://40.media.tumblr.com/9a4b25adb2bdbde078169fcd696ccf2a/tumblr_o3f1paI5JR1sk2tkuo1_540.jpg

There should be more fan stories/writings included in these community creations, not just visuals. For example, I wrote a bunch of[ haikus](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/iHnlA3o5-untitled-poems-by-khada-jhin-the-path-of-the-virtuoso) as Jhin, inspired by the poems WAAARGHbobo revealed during Jhin's Q & A, as well as a [shot story](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/Rqima14l-the-show-must-go-on) from his point of view. These were so much fun to write, and it was even more fun getting into character as Jhin. He is easily one of my favorite champions concept-wise, hands down.
